description: Retrieves a list of the IAM Identity Center associated Amazon Web Services accounts that the principal has access to. This action must be called from the management account containing your organization instance of IAM Identity Center. This action is not valid for account instances of IAM Identity Center.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the instance of IAM Identity Center that contains the principal.

parameters.name: PrincipalId
parameters.description: Specifies the principal for which you want to retrieve the list of account assignments.

parameters.name: PrincipalType
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the principal.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Specifies an Amazon Web Services account ID number. Results are filtered to only those that match this ID number. AccountId (string) --- The ID number of an Amazon Web Services account that filters the results in the response.

nested_params.name: AccountId
nested_params.description: The ID number of an Amazon Web Services account that filters the results in the response.

nested_items.name: AccountAssignments
nested_items.description: An array list of the account assignments for the principal.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID number of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: PermissionSetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center permission set assigned to this principal for this Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
